A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This movie was absolutely incredible and I do not understand some of the criticism that people our talking about in there reviews. Especially when it comes to character devoplment. Luke has one of the best character arc in a Star Wars movie ever\, and in the end proves to be the jedi master. The cinematography is absolute gorgeous with some scenes taking your breath away. I understand that no movie is prefect and there were things that could be improved but this movie ranks as my second favorite Star Wars movie behind empire strikes back.
